alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 10:13PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Crawford and southeastern Washington Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1013 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Blackburn, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... West Fork... Winslow... Devils Den State Park... Brentwood... Strickler... Blackburn... Wyola... Woolsey... Hogeye... Mount Gayler... Hicks... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 37 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
